title: Sunflower Cocktail
directions: Combine gin, orange-flavored liqueur, elderflower liqueur, and lemon juice with some crushed ice in a cocktail shaker. Cover and shake until the outside of shaker has frosted. Strain into 2 glasses.
ingredients: 2 (1.5 fluid ounce) jiggers gin (such as Aviation or Hendrick's)
2 (1.5 fluid ounce) jiggers orange-flavored liqueur (such as Cointreau)
2 (1.5 fluid ounce) jiggers elderflower liqueur (such as St. Germain)
